DOC.brief_summary: This single-visit prospective study establish real world Marketed Contact Lens 'Through Focus Curve ' ( TFC ) measurement compare consistency vision myopes hyperope . 33 subject enrol ( least 15 myope 15 hyperope ) , 40 year age old , 1-visit , 4-hour study measurement take .
DOC.brief_title: Marketed Contact Lens Real World Through Focus Curve
DOC.criteria: The subject must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . The subject must ≥40 year age . The subject ' optimal vertexed spherical equivalent distance correction must 6.00 Diopters ( D ) +4.00 D eye . The subject 's refractive cylinder must ≤ 0.75 D eye . The subject 's ADD power must range +0.75 +2.50 D eye . The subject must best correct visual acuity 20/25 good eye . The subject either new contact lens wearer exist soft contact lens wearer . Currently pregnant lactating . Any ocular systemic allergy contraindicate contact lens wear . Any ocular systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication contraindicates contact lens wear . Any ocular abnormality may interfere contact lens wear . Use ocular medication , exception rewetting drop . Any previous intraocular surgery ( e.g. , radial keratotomy , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) , laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) , etc . ) Any grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g. , edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) may contraindicate contact lens wear . History herpetic keratitis . Any ocular infection inflammation . Any corneal distortion irregular cornea . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus . Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) . History diabetes . Participant unrelated research involve test product within 30 day plan study visit .
